directions: In a mixing bowl, add pork belly, onion, garlic, green chili, spring onions, gochujang, gochugaru, soy sauce, ginger, brown sugar, sesame oil and ground black pepper. Mix well. Let it marinate for about 10 minutes to 30 minutes.
Heat a pan over medium heat.
Add the mixed ingredients into the pan and stir-fry until pork belly is cooked thoroughly. The onion will look translucent and mushy when it’s done.
Plate it and add a big pinch of roasted sesame seeds on top. Serve with rice, lettuce and kimchi.
ingredients: 1 big pinch of roasted sesame seeds
title: Jeyuk Bokkeum (Dwaejigogi Bokkeum) – Korean Stir-Fry Spicy Pork
